translations.translation: We will pave his way to Ease.
We shall ease the way of fortune for him.
We shall facilitate for him the Way to Bliss.
observe piety, and believe in receiving rewards from God.
So We will very soon provide him ease.
We will make smooth for him the path of ease.
We will facilitate for him the easy end.
We shall surely ease him to the Easing.
Surely We will ease his way unto the state of ease.
We will pave his way to ease.
Unto him therefore We shall indeed make easy the path to ease.
We will surely ease him toward facility.
We will indeed make smooth for him the path to Bliss.
We will make smooth for him the path of ease (goodness).
We shall surely ease him to the Path of Easing;
We will ease his way towards ease.
We will ease him toward ease.
[92:7] We shall surely ease his way to [the abode of] ease, to Paradise.

(Surely We will ease his way unto the state of ease) We shall make easy for him acts of obedience and give him success, time and again, to perform acts of obedience; and it is also said this means: We shall give him success, time and again, to give alms for the sake of Allah; this refers to Abu Bakr al-Siddiq.

commentaries.author: الجيلاني
commentaries.text: { فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ } أي: نُعدُّه ونوفِّقه { لِلْيُسْرَىٰ } [الليل: 7] للطريق السهلة الموصلة إلى مقصد التوحيد، والمعرفة المنجية عن غياهب الشكوك وظلمَّات الأوهام
